type: Canada Aviation and Space Museum mobile app. Creative Direction and UX design. 2013
description: A popular request among the visitors to the museum was to look inside the cockpit of the airplanes on display at the museum. The purpose of the app was to bring that oportunity to visitors. A panorimic view of the cockpit was implemented to show inside the app. Unfortunately although this app was fully developed it didn't make live.
